data.description: Matches lang preference to available langs
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I wrote this module as part of a product internationalization
    effort. I needed to determine what language bundle I should use in
    specific situations and decided that writing a perl module that
    implemented the functionality described in the HTTP/1.1
    specification section 14.4 (RFC 2616) in a protocol agnostic fashion
    would be ideal.

    When taken out of the HTTP context, the most ideal place for this
    module in my mind is under I18N for its applicability to
    internationalized software.
